participant_1.background:
I am a hobbyist who flies model airplanes in my spare time.
I ride my bicycle every day to keep fit and to clear my head so I can focus on my writing.
My husband and I love working with our hands and building things together.
i like to build furniture.
i am passionate about a lot of things.

participant_2.background:
I will share my love for hamburgers with others through my let's plays.
madonna is my all time favorite.
I spend my day reminiscing about my childhood and cherishing the close bond I have with my family.
i am on my way to uc santa cruz where i was accepted.
Fishing with my dad was one of the best times I had growing up.

content.text: Hi there!  How is your day going?
Hi!  It is going well, thanks!  I got into UC Santa Cruz, so I am on my way there in the fall!
That is great news, congratulations!  What are you going to study there?
I am not sure yet.  I am thinking about doing something in the entertainment industry, though.
That sounds like a great idea!  What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, watch movies, and listen to music.  I also like to spend time with my family and friends.
Those are all great hobbies!  I enjoy watching movies and listening to music too.  I also like to ride my bicycle, and I am a hobbyist who flies model airplanes in my spare time.
That is so cool!  I have never flown a model airplane before.
It is a lot of fun!  I do it with my husband, and we love working with our hands and building things together.
That sounds like a great way to spend time with your husband.  I am glad you are both so passionate about something.
Thanks!  We are both very happy that I got into UC Santa Cruz.  It is a great school, and I am excited to start my journey there in the fall.
I am sure you will have a great time there!  Good luck with everything!
